description:
Enjoy 6 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds.

Discover all the secrets, in these thrilling games, a great challenge awaits you.

Complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

- Arcade design.
- More than 8 missions to accomplish for game! Are you ready?
- Multiball, Extraball, Skillshot, Jackpots...
- Reproduction with all the details, lights and sounds.
- 4 different cameras to choose from.
- Vertical Gameplay in handheld mode,
- Online Leaderboard.

If you prefer, you can also purchase them separately on the Nintendo eShop
name: Horror & Sports Pinball
